document_data.mainbody:
tormstars Ride was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Stormstars Ride was located in the northwest section of Waterdeeps Sea Ward near the Trolltower. It branched south and southwest from the Street of Lances to end on the Street of Glances where Staghunters Way also merged. Stormstars Ride was also intersected by Aureenar Street and Phastal Street.
